Open Enrollment for Elgin Local Schools is now OPEN

span.p: The open enrollment application is to be completed online. The window is open from 4/1/2020 - 5/15/2020 for all Elgin students who do not live in the Elgin school district but would like to attend Elgin Local Schools next school year.
Parent/Guardian need to click here to complete the Open Enrollment Application.

Elgin Local Schools will be delivering meals via current bus routes to ALL children (both school age and preschool age). Buses will arrive between 11 am and 1 pm. Please call Teresa Vermillion at 740-223-4300, extension 6000 with questions.

p.b: Beginning Monday, March 30 meals will be delivered ONLY on Mondays and Wednesdays. These delivery days WILL include additional meals to account for breakfasts/lunches for all weekdays.

span.p: Please fill out the School Lunch Request form.
